扠字的基本解释

扠
chā
同“叉1”③。

扠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chāi］
［《廣韻》丑佳切，平佳，徹。］
用拳击；交手较量。
[②]［chā］
［《集韻》初加切，平麻，初。］
(1)同“叉”。一种端上有两个或三、四个微弯长齿的长柄器具。
(2)谓用叉刺取。
(3)挟取。
(4)形成叉形。参见“扠2手”。
(5)推，搡。
(6)犹插。
[③]［chà］
同“岔1”。
[④]［chá］
挡住，卡住。
[⑤]［zhǎ］
拇指与食指或中指伸张开来的长度。

扠字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　扠； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页418第04
【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?初加切，音叉。挾取也。【韓愈詩】饞扠飽活臠。　又器名。【周禮·天官·?人】簎魚?。【註】以扠刺泥中搏取之。　又【集韻】【韻會】?初佳切，音釵。打也。　又【廣韻】丑佳切【集韻】攄佳切，?與搋同。以拳加物也。【韻會】通作叉。或借用杈。

扠字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
扠字的起名意思

暂无。

cross
Basic explanation of words
cross
chā
Same as "Fork 1" ③.
cross
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chāi］
["Guangyun" is ugly, flat, and thorough. ]
Use boxing; fight against each other.
[②]［chā］
["Ji Yun" add cutting at the beginning, flat hemp, at the beginning. ]
(1) Same as "fork". A long-handled appliance with two or three or four slightly curved long teeth on the end.
(2) Said to be taken with a fork.
(3) Take away.
(4) Form a fork shape. See "Fork 2 hands".
(5) Pushing, shoving.
(6) Still inserted.
[③]［chà］
Same as "Cha 1".
[④]［chá］
Block, get stuck.
[⑤]［zhǎ］
The stretched length of the thumb and index finger or middle finger.
cross
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　 Fork; Kangxi Strokes: 7; Page Number: Page 418 04
[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Positive Rhyme]? First cut, tuning fork. Take it too. [Han Yushi] gluttonous and lively.　Also name. 【Zhou Li·Tian Guan··Human】Saiyu?. [Note] Strike it with a fork in the mud.　[Jiyun] [Yunhui]? Chu Jiaqie, Yinchai. Fight too.　[Guangyun] Ugly Jiaqie [Jiyun] Jiaqie,? Same as 搋. Add things with fists. [Rhyme Club] It is a cross. Or borrow a branch.
